name: The Path to Freedom
description:
THE PATH TO FREEDOM (or Hard Game)

-------------------------------------

The goal is simple, to reach the whirlpool without touching the red barbed wire!

| Controls |

Multidirectional arrows to move. 

| Credits |

It's an old abandoned project of @Akip, he gave me permission to continue it.

Black Zone - a music by @Zapdexio (check out his projects, there are good!)

One piece Outro 

-------------------------------------
